name: Katina Saga 4: The Other Side of Guartron
name_original: Katina Saga 4: The Other Side of Guartron
description:
Katina has discovered what she must do to be able to do battle with Kraytor. She must get to outer space, which means she needs a ship and a pilot. Enter Captain Zax and his ship the Hornet. Katina needs to get cross the Kitab Desert and the Great Field in order to reach Attlantys and start her quest to stop Kraytor. 
More exciting puzzles, battles, and mini games as Katina returns in another exciting adventure.
